InstallationEvent

Triggered when a GitHub App has been installed (created) or uninstalled (deleted).

Events API payload

Key Type Description
action string The action that was performed. Can be either created or deleted.
installation object The installation itself.

Webhook event name

installation

Webhook payload example

{
  "action": "deleted",
  "installation": {
    "id": 22,
    "account": {
      "login": "Codertocat",
      "id": 4,
      "node_id": "MDQ6VXNlcjQ=",
      "avatar_url": "http://octocoders.github.io/avatars/u/4?",
      "gravatar_id": "",
      "url": "http://octocoders.github.io/api/v3/users/Codertocat",
      "html_url": "http://octocoders.github.io/Codertocat",
      "followers_url": "http://octocoders.github.io/api/v3/users/Codertocat/followers",
      "following_url": "http://octocoders.github.io/api/v3/users/Codertocat/following{/other_user}",
      "gists_url": "http://octocoders.github.io/api/v3/users/Codertocat/gists{/gist_id}",
      "starred_url": "http://octocoders.github.io/api/v3/users/Codertocat/starred{/owner}{/repo}",
      "subscriptions_url": "http://octocoders.github.io/api/v3/users/Codertocat/subscriptions",
      "organizations_url": "http://octocoders.github.io/api/v3/users/Codertocat/orgs",
      "repos_url": "http://octocoders.github.io/api/v3/users/Codertocat/repos",
      "events_url": "http://octocoders.github.io/api/v3/users/Codertocat/events{/privacy}",
      "received_events_url": "http://octocoders.github.io/api/v3/users/Codertocat/received_events",
      "type": "User",
      "site_admin": false
    },
    "repository_selection": "selected",
    "access_tokens_url": "http://octocoders.github.io/api/v3/installations/22/access_tokens",
    "repositories_url": "http://octocoders.github.io/api/v3/installation/repositories",
    "html_url": "http://octocoders.github.io/settings/installations/22",
    "app_id": 1,
    "target_id": 4,
    "target_type": "User",
    "permissions": {
      "metadata": "read"
    },
    "events": [
    ],
    "created_at": "2018-07-11T14:43:03.000Z",
    "updated_at": "2018-07-11T14:43:03.000Z",
    "single_file_name": null
  },
  "sender": {
    "login": "Codertocat",
    "id": 4,
    "node_id": "MDQ6VXNlcjQ=",
    "avatar_url": "http://octocoders.github.io/avatars/u/4?",
    "gravatar_id": "",
    "url": "http://octocoders.github.io/api/v3/users/Codertocat",
    "html_url": "http://octocoders.github.io/Codertocat",
    "followers_url": "http://octocoders.github.io/api/v3/users/Codertocat/followers",
    "following_url": "http://octocoders.github.io/api/v3/users/Codertocat/following{/other_user}",
    "gists_url": "http://octocoders.github.io/api/v3/users/Codertocat/gists{/gist_id}",
    "starred_url": "http://octocoders.github.io/api/v3/users/Codertocat/starred{/owner}{/repo}",
    "subscriptions_url": "http://octocoders.github.io/api/v3/users/Codertocat/subscriptions",

    "repos_url": "http://octocoders.github.io/api/v3/users/Codertocat/repos",
    "events_url": "http://octocoders.github.io/api/v3/users/Codertocat/events{/privacy}",
    "received_events_url": "http://octocoders.github.io/api/v3/users/Codertocat/received_events",
    "type": "User",
    "site_admin": false
  }
